typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as integer,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		PipeLineName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source2
source2, source1 join(AddressID == Column_1,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 alterRow(deleteIf(isNull(Column_1))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 alterRow(insertIf(isNull(AddressID))) ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow2 select(mapColumn(
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		StateProvince,
		CountryRegion,
		PostalCode,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate,
		PipeLineName,
		Column_1,
		Column_2,
		Column_3,
		Column_4,
		Column_5,
		Column_6,
		Column_7,
		Column_8,
		Column_9
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'testcontainer',
	folderPath: 'AddressParquet',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		StateProvince,
		CountryRegion,
		PostalCode,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate,
		PipeLineName,
		Column_1,
		Column_2,
		Column_3,
		Column_4,
		Column_5,
		Column_6,
		Column_7,
		Column_8,
		Column_9
	)) ~> sink1
